trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Edmond
There were no other sightings in Edmond on or around March 15th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was in my car driving west in my neighborhood (fenwick neighborhood in edmond, ok) going less than 15 miles an hour (having started driving from a stop). i don't know the exact date, but it was mid march. it was around 2:45pm and a sunny and partly cloudy day. i saw movement in the sky from the south descending down to the north right infront of me. i couldn't tell how far or close it was. i drove around the general area it would have landed if it were very close, but didn't find anything. when i first saw it, i thought it was a shooting star. but this was happening during the middle of the day and the "shooting star" was a glowing green. the tail seemed more pale yellow\white. it was moving fast like a shooting star. i drove faster towards it to see if i could locate where it may have gone down, but had no luck. i lost sight of it when it went behind a nearby house. i pulled over to see if i could see more objects, but did not see any others.
Summary: Glowing green fireball during the day
